about.title: About Me
about.description1: I am BENMOUSSA Mohammed, a software engineer passionate about new technologies. With a solid background in digital engineering and numerous professional experiences, I am dedicated to creating innovative and efficient solutions.
about.description2: Outside of work, I love reading, coding for fun, and participating in hackathons. My goal is to continue learning and evolving in the technology field.
about.description3: I am always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to contact me to discuss projects or ideas.

testimonial1.name: Manager
testimonial1.feedback: Mohammed has solid technical skills, is serious, and rigorous. His work exceeds expectations.

article1.title: Artificial Intelligence in 2024: New Advances
article1.description: Discover the latest advances in AI this year.
article1.content: In 2024, artificial intelligence has made significant progress in the fields of medicine, industrial automation, and data management. New machine learning technologies enable more accurate diagnostics and better process optimization.

formation2.school: École Nationale Supérieure d'Informatique et d'Analyse des Systèmes
